title: 1 bedroom 1.5 bath Condo/Apartment
posting_body: ['Enjoy open concept living where everything is new!', '1 bedroom large spacious and 1.5 bath.', 'Living room with fireplace open to ample eat-in kitchen with breakfast bar, granite and stainless appliances.', 'Laundry inside the unit, washer and dryer included.', '1st floor unit.', 'Efficient gas heat.', 'Gas/Elec Utilities not included.', 'Water/Sewer/Trash/Landscape/Snow Removal included.', 'No Pets, No Smoking.', '1 year lease required.', "2 month's security and 1st month's rent required at lease signing.", 'Note: A background/credit check is required, only approved applicants will be offered a showing.', 'Copy and paste the link below into your URL to apply now: <URL>/']
